p: The four factors affected the distribution of the eight species in different contents, with the strongest effects of micro-topographies ( Table 4 and Figure 5). Among the four factors, micro-topography was most highly correlated with the first ordination axis, followed by slope grade ( Table 4 and Figure 5). Slope grade was mostly correlated with the second ordination axis, followed by micro-topography ( Table 4 and Figure 5).
